name: Patchwork Technologies
long_description:
Patchwork automates logging from code to storage. We make it possible to automatically add actionable, structured event logs across your entire codebase. OTel is automated instrumentation for the ideal world, Patchwork is for everyone else.

Patchwork was founded by three engineers who know what good looks like when it comes to observability, but also know it's takes a lot of dev effort to do manually.
one_liner: The next generation logging and observability platform
